name: Modular Toolbar
description: A modular toolbar with dark neon UI that spawns text, shapes, and anchor points directly on the canvas
author: StickerNest

activeTool.description: Currently active tool: select, move, text, pen, shapes, bucket, eraser

canvasClick.description: Receives canvas click events with position for tool actions

tool:changed.description: Emitted when a tool is selected

tool:mode.description: Emits current tool mode for canvas interaction

spawn:text.description: Spawn a text element on the canvas

spawn:shape.description: Spawn a shape (rect, circle, triangle, etc.) on the canvas

spawn:anchor.description: Spawn an anchor point for pen/path tool

canvas:fill.description: Fill canvas or selected element with color

toolbar:saved.description: Emitted when save button is clicked
